Topic Summary: Appeal relates to the denial of business property relief in respect of a portion of deemed cash assets received by the Appellant in the form of a gift.
Tax Legislation: Section 27, Section 46, Section 49, Section 67, Section 90, Section 92, Section 93, Section 94, Section 99, Section 100 & Section 101, of the Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003 ("CATCA 2003"), Section 949 AK Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (“TCA 1997”)
